title: Topic 001 Question 103
body: You have a Fabric workspace named Workspace1 that contains a dataflow named Dataflow1. Dataflow1 returns 500 rows of data.
You need to identify the min and max values for each column in the query results.
Which three Data view options should you select? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct answer is worth one point.
options: Show column profile in details pane
